trans-unit.source: Provides a serializable type of endpoint address that is compliant with the version of WS-Addressing published in August 2004 and that enables it to be exposed as part of the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 提供在 2004 年 8 月發行的端點位址的 Ws-addressing 版本與相容的可序列化型別，使它公開為服務合約的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not serializable nor is it tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>不是可序列化，也不是繫結至特定版本的 Ws-addressing 規格。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] supplies a class that provides a serializable type, <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10>, which is WS-Addressing V1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供這個類別提供可序列化的型別， <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10>，也就是符合 Ws-addressing V1。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10>

trans-unit.source: This class provides a WS-Addressing August 2004 compliant wrapper for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that is serializable and bound to a particular wire format for legacy purposes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供之 Ws-addressing August 2004 標準包裝函式<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>，適用於舊版的序列化和繫結至特定 wire 格式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29> method does the wrapping and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.ToEndpointAddress%2A> method does the unwrapping, allowing the recovery of the endpoint address after being serialized on the wire.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29>方法會進行包裝而<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.ToEndpointAddress%2A>方法會解除包裝，允許在網路上序列化後得以端點位址的復原。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.ToEndpointAddress%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"></xref> class with a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"></xref>類別具有指定之端點位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification or bound to a particular wire format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>未繫結至特定版本的 Ws-addressing 規格或繫結至特定 wire 格式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> used to initialize the instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>用來初始化這個類別之執行個體</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004"></xref> class that contains the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004"> </xref>類別，其中包含指定的端點位址。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML-qualified name that describes the XML representation of the version 1 endpoint address from a specified cached schema.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 XML 限定名稱，描述版本 1 的端點位址，從指定的快取結構描述的 XML 表示。

trans-unit.source: This method is required by the serialization contract.
trans-unit.target: 序列化合約需要此方法。

trans-unit.source: It must be public to be seen by the XmlSerializer.
trans-unit.target: 它必須公開讓 XmlSerializer 看到。

trans-unit.source: It is not intended to be called by developers.
trans-unit.target: 它不是由開發人員呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that contains a cache of the XML schema definition language (XSD) schemas for the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>，其中包含端點位址的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述快取。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that describes the XML representation of the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>描述端點位址的 XML 表示法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: xmlSchemaSet is .
trans-unit.target: xmlSchemaSetis .

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> from which the endpoint address is obtained.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>從其中取得端點位址。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which the current endpoint address is saved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>儲存目前端點位址。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the endpoint address contained in this serializable type.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個可序列化的型別中的端點位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that contains a version-neutral endpoint address of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>，其中包含這個中性版本端點位址<xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004"> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>
